text: Içami Tiba (March 15, 1941 – August 2, 2015) was a Brazilian psychiatrist, writer and panelist. Tiba was known for writing his book Quem ama, Educa!. He was born in Tapiraí, Brazil. Tiba died in São Paulo, Brazil, aged 74.Içami Tiba, autor de ‘Quem ama, Educa!’, morre aos 74 anos ==References== ==Other websites== *Official page Category:1941 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Psychiatrists Category:Writers from São Paulo Category:Scientists from São Paulo
title: Içami Tiba
